context: The Centre for Arts, Design & Technology at George Brown College accepts donations to support student scholarships. Donors will receive a charitable tax receipt for their gift, and 100% of the donation goes directly towards student scholarships. Prospective students can sign up on the website to receive updates about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more. The contact information is: 416-415-2000 (regular line), TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The website content is subject to change without notice and should not be considered a representation or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying their own fee requirements with the college.
